reuters.title: U.S. NET CORPORATE PROFITS ROSE 6.1 PCT IN 4TH QTR AFTER 5.5 PCT 3RD QTR RISE
reuters.body: Spain's second largest union, the Workers Commissions, CC.OO, has voted against a general strike next month to back wage demands and oppose the government's economic policies, a CC.OO spokesman said. The proposal for a general strike was narrowly defeated at a meeting yesterday but union leaders voted instead for a national week of strike action beginning on April 3 and urged their members to concentrate their protests on April 10. The Socialist General Workers' Union, UGT, the country's biggest union, is against a general strike but has joined forces with CC.OO. To demand real wage rises this year. Reuter 
